Verified no exception, but content assist does not work for this case:

* Stop at breakpoint (above).
* select 't' in the variables pain
* type "this." in the variables view display area
* content assist - there are NO completions available.

David, can you take a look at this?

There is a problem with the class Hashtable
see bug http://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=14592

I add a protection in TypeConverter code.

Fixed in DetailsCompletionProcessor.
Incorrectly setting the context to be static if the frame was static.
